section.section: Subject to paragraph (2) of this subsection, the political subdivision that has created a special fund for a development district may pledge under an agreement that amounts deposited to the special fund shall be paid over to secure payment on MEDCO obligations.

The agreement shall:
be in writing;
be executed by the political subdivision making the pledge, the Maryland Economic Development Corporation, and the other persons that the governing body of the political subdivision determines; and
run to the benefit of and be enforceable on behalf of the holders of the MEDCO obligations secured by the agreement.

text.section:
If bonds are outstanding with respect to a development district, the special fund may be used as described in subsection (a) of this section in any fiscal year only if:
the balance of the special fund exceeds the unpaid debt service payable on the bonds in the fiscal year; and
the special fund is not restricted so as to prohibit the use.
The issuance of bonds pledging the full faith and credit of the political subdivision shall comply with appropriate county or municipal charter requirements.
